title: League Client Beta Not Opening
body: I click the League icon to open, it ends up showing the logo, then just goes away, nothing else happens. Apparently someone already complained about this exact same problem 2 years ago on another discussion and their problems were recognized by Riot Administrators although this is the new league client Beta so I worry the fixing process is different. So the obvious age old question which I lack for a better way of saying: "How do I fix this?"

replies.body: The client is trying to open, but something like a security setting is blocking it from happening.  Try out the instructions found in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help!  Let me know if you have any questions.
Hey! It worked! Turned out to be a much lesser of a problem than I thought. Thank you and sorry I've been an inconvenience.
Oh! Thank you very much! I'll try that!
